text: Embark on unforgettable journeys across Morocco with our expertly curated tours. From the majestic Atlas Mountains to the golden dunes of the Sahara, our tours offer a perfect blend of adventure, culture, and relaxation.

cards.titre: 2 day Tour from Marrakech to Zagora Desert
cards.about: Explore the beauty of the Moroccan desert on this 2-day tour from Marrakech to Zagora. Experience the stunning landscapes, traditional Berber villages, and the magic of the Sahara Desert.
Highlights: Cross the High Atlas Mountains
Visit Ait Benhaddou, a UNESCO World Heritage site
Explore the Draa Valley and its palm groves
Spend a night in a desert camp under the stars
Included: Overnight accommodation in a desert camp

liste: Departure from Marrakech early in the morning
Cross the Tizi n'Tichka pass (2260m) in the High Atlas Mountains
Visit the UNESCO World Heritage site of Ait Benhaddou
Lunch in Ouarzazate
Continue through the Draa Valley to Zagora
Arrive at the desert camp, enjoy a camel ride and watch the sunset
Dinner and overnight in the desert camp
Early morning sunrise in the desert
Breakfast at the camp
Return journey to Marrakech via the Draa Valley and High Atlas Mountains
Arrival in Marrakech in the evening

cards.titre: 2 days Tour Marrakech to Fes via Merzouga Desert
cards.about: Embark on a 2-day desert adventure from Marrakech to Fes, crossing the majestic Atlas Mountains, exploring the Sahara Desert, and experiencing the unique culture of Morocco. This tour offers a mix of stunning landscapes, historical sites, and unforgettable desert experiences.
Highlights: Cross the High Atlas Mountains
Visit the UNESCO World Heritage site of Ait Benhaddou
Explore the stunning Ziz Valley
Experience a night in a desert camp under the stars
Discover the Middle Atlas Mountains on the way to Fes
Included: Transport in a comfortable 4x4 or minivan
Overnight accommodation in a desert camp

titre: Marrakech - High Atlas Mountains - Ait Benhaddou - Merzouga Desert
liste: Early morning departure from Marrakech

Visit the UNESCO World Heritage site of Ait Benhaddou
Lunch in Ouarzazate or along the way
Continue through the Draa Valley and the Ziz Valley
Arrive in Merzouga, enjoy a camel ride to the desert camp
Watch the sunset over the dunes
Dinner and overnight in the desert camp

titre: Merzouga Desert - Middle Atlas Mountains - Fes
liste: Early morning sunrise in the desert
Breakfast at the camp
Return to Merzouga by camel or 4x4
Drive through the Middle Atlas Mountains, passing through Erfoud and Midelt
Lunch in Midelt or along the way
Continue to Fes, passing through the cedar forests of Azrou
Arrival in Fes in the evening

cards.titre: 2 days Desert Tour from Marrakech to Marrakech
cards.about: Experience the magic of the Sahara Desert on this 2-day tour from Marrakech to Merzouga. Cross the High Atlas Mountains, visit traditional Berber villages, and spend a night under the stars in a desert camp. This tour offers a perfect blend of adventure, culture, and breathtaking landscapes.
Highlights: Cross the High Atlas Mountains via the Tizi n'Tichka pass
Visit the UNESCO World Heritage site of Ait Benhaddou
Explore the Draa Valley and its palm groves
Enjoy a camel ride in the Merzouga dunes
Spend a night in a luxury desert camp
Included: Transport in a comfortable 4x4 or minivan
Overnight accommodation in a desert camp

cards.titre: 3 days Desert Trip from Marrakech to Merzouga
cards.about: Embark on a 3-day desert adventure from Marrakech to Merzouga, exploring the stunning landscapes of the High Atlas Mountains, the Draa Valley, and the Sahara Desert. This tour offers a mix of cultural experiences, breathtaking scenery, and unforgettable moments under the stars.

Visit the UNESCO World Heritage site of Ait Benhaddou
Explore the Draa Valley and its palm groves

Included: Transport in a comfortable 4x4 or minivan
2 nights of accommodation (1 in a hotel, 1 in a desert camp)

cards.titre: 3 days Desert Trip from Marrakech to Fes
cards.about: Discover the beauty of the Sahara Desert on this 3-day tour from Fes to Merzouga. Cross the Middle Atlas Mountains, explore the Ziz Valley, and experience the magic of the Erg Chebbi dunes. This tour offers a perfect blend of adventure, culture, and breathtaking landscapes.
Highlights: Cross the Middle Atlas Mountains
Visit the charming town of Ifrane and the cedar forests of Azrou
Explore the Ziz Valley and its palm groves
Experience a camel ride in the Merzouga dunes
Spend a night in a luxury desert camp
Included: Transport in a comfortable 4x4 or minivan
2 nights of accommodation (1 in a hotel, 1 in a desert camp)

titre: Fes - Ifrane - Azrou - Midelt - Ziz Valley - Merzouga
liste: Early morning departure from Fes
Cross the Middle Atlas Mountains, passing through Ifrane (known as 'Little Switzerland')
Visit the cedar forests of Azrou and see the Barbary macaques
Lunch in Midelt
Continue through the Ziz Valley, famous for its palm groves and stunning landscapes
Arrive in Merzouga, enjoy a camel ride to the desert camp
Watch the sunset over the Erg Chebbi dunes
Dinner and overnight in a luxury desert camp
Early morning sunrise in the desert
Breakfast at the camp
Explore the Merzouga area, including a visit to a nomadic family
Visit the village of Khamlia to experience Gnawa music
Lunch in Merzouga
Free time to relax or explore the dunes
Dinner and overnight in the desert camp
Breakfast at the camp
Return to Merzouga by camel or 4x4
Visit the market town of Rissani and the fossil workshops in Erfoud
Begin the journey back to Fes, passing through the Ziz Valley and Middle Atlas Mountains
Lunch in Midelt or along the way
Arrival in Fes in the evening

cards.titre: 4 days Trip from Marrakech to Merzouga
cards.about: Embark on a 4-day desert adventure from Marrakech to the Sahara Desert and back. This tour takes you through the High Atlas Mountains, the Draa Valley, and the stunning Erg Chebbi dunes. Experience the magic of the desert, traditional Berber culture, and breathtaking landscapes.

Visit the UNESCO World Heritage site of Ait Benhaddou

Included: Transport in a comfortable 4x4 or minivan
3 nights of accommodation (2 in hotels, 1 in a desert camp)

cards.titre: 9 days Tour from Marrakech to Zagora / Erg Chegaga
cards.about: Embark on a 9-day adventure from Marrakech to the Zagora Desert, exploring the diverse landscapes of Morocco. This tour takes you through the High Atlas Mountains, the Draa Valley, the Sahara Desert, and the coastal city of Essaouira. Experience the rich culture, history, and natural beauty of Morocco on this unforgettable journey.
Highlights: Cross the High Atlas Mountains via the Tizi n'Tichka pass
Visit the UNESCO World Heritage site of Ait Benhaddou
Explore the Draa Valley and its palm groves
Experience a camel ride in the Zagora Desert
Spend a night in a desert camp under the stars
Discover the Todra Gorge and Dades Valley
Visit the coastal city of Essaouira
Included: Transport in a comfortable 4x4 or minivan
8 nights of accommodation (7 in hotels, 1 in a desert camp)

cards.titre: 5 days Trip from Fes to Marrakech via Merzouga
cards.about: Embark on a 5-day adventure from Fes to Marrakech, exploring the stunning landscapes of the Middle Atlas Mountains, the Ziz Valley, the Sahara Desert, and the Todra Gorge. This tour offers a perfect blend of adventure, culture, and breathtaking scenery, with a night under the stars in a desert camp.

cards.titre: 6 days Tour from Casablanca to Marrakech
cards.about: Embark on a 6-day adventure from Casablanca to Marrakech, exploring the diverse landscapes of Morocco. This tour takes you through the imperial cities of Rabat and Fes, the Middle Atlas Mountains, the Sahara Desert, and the stunning Todra Gorge. Experience the rich culture, history, and natural beauty of Morocco on this unforgettable journey.
Highlights: Visit the Hassan II Mosque in Casablanca
Explore the imperial cities of Rabat and Fes
Cross the Middle Atlas Mountains
Experience a camel ride in the Merzouga dunes
Spend a night in a luxury desert camp
Discover the Todra Gorge and Dades Valley
Visit the UNESCO World Heritage site of Ait Benhaddou

5 nights of accommodation (4 in hotels, 1 in a desert camp)

cards.titre: 8 days Imperial Cities & Merzouga Sahara Desert
cards.about: Embark on an 8-day adventure through Morocco, exploring the imperial cities, the Sahara Desert, and the stunning gorges. This tour takes you through Rabat, Fes, Merzouga, Todra Gorge, Dades Valley, Ouarzazate, and Marrakech. Experience the rich culture, history, and natural beauty of Morocco on this unforgettable journey.

cards.titre: 3 Days Desert Tour from Chefchaouen to Marrakech
cards.about: Embark on a 3-day desert adventure from Chefchaouen to Marrakech, exploring the stunning landscapes of the Rif Mountains, the Middle Atlas Mountains, and the Sahara Desert. This tour offers a perfect blend of adventure, culture, and breathtaking scenery, with a night under the stars in a desert camp.
Highlights: Explore the blue city of Chefchaouen
Cross the Rif and Middle Atlas Mountains
Visit the charming town of Ifrane and the cedar forests of Azrou
Experience a camel ride in the Merzouga dunes
Spend a night in a luxury desert camp
Included: Transport in a comfortable 4x4 or minivan
